text: melum, murkalattil tittamaka yusuhp telivana attatcikalutan unkalitam vantar, eninum avar irantu vitum varaiyil, avar unkalitam kontu vantataip parri ninkal cantekattileye iruntirkal; irutiyil (avar irantapin)"avarukkup pin enta rasulaiyum (tutaraiyum) allah anuppave mattan" enrum kurinirkal; ivvare, evar varampu miric cantekikkiraro avarai allah valikettil vittu vitukiran
